players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso. We need to vote her out to protect the town."
Diana: "I don't know why Bob is pointing fingers at me right away. Maybe he's the one we should be suspicious of."
You: "I'm not sure about Bob's quick accusation of Diana. Let's all share our thoughts before deciding."
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso, and I have proof from last night’s investigation. Trusting me and voting her out now is the only way to keep the town safe."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, share your proof properly! This rush to vote me out smells fishy—maybe you're the mafioso framing me."
You: "I'm still unsure. Bob, why do you think Diana is the mafioso based on your investigation?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana is the mafioso. We need to vote her out to protect the town."
Diana: "I don't know why Bob is pointing fingers at me right away. Maybe he's the one we should be suspicious of."
Alice: "I'm not sure about Bob's quick accusation of Diana. Let's all share our thoughts before deciding."
You: "Diana is the mafioso, and I have proof from last night’s investigation. Trusting me and voting her out now is the only way to keep the town safe."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, share your proof properly! This rush to vote me out smells fishy—maybe you're the mafioso framing me."
Alice: "I'm still unsure. Bob, why do you think Diana is the mafioso based on your investigation?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso. We need to vote her out to protect the town."
You: "I don't know why Bob is pointing fingers at me right away. Maybe he's the one we should be suspicious of."
Alice: "I'm not sure about Bob's quick accusation of Diana. Let's all share our thoughts before deciding."
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso, and I have proof from last night’s investigation. Trusting me and voting her out now is the only way to keep the town safe."
You: "Bob, if you're the detective, share your proof properly! This rush to vote me out smells fishy—maybe you're the mafioso framing me."
Alice: "I'm still unsure. Bob, why do you think Diana is the mafioso based on your investigation?"
